    LinkedIn

    Here is a link to my LinkedIn profile. On it, you can find information about my volunteer history, work experience, etc. You can also connect with me through LinkedIn.

    TheRiot Agency

    Here is a link to the website of TheRiot Agency. I am currently employed as an intern at TheRiot Agency. I am primarily working on developing an integrated visual data solution for internal and client KPIs.

    LA Program

    Here is a link to the site containing information about the LA program. I was a Learning Assistant for Calculus 2. I helped the students learn the information by explaining it to them as well as helping them solve problems. Another one of my tasks was "correcting" their homework assignments. When they got points off, if they could demonstrate to me that they had since come to understand the problems, then they could get points added to their grade.

    FTL Metrics

    Here is a link to the website of FTL Metrics. I was contracted by FTL Metrics to use the Insightly and LinkedIn platforms to gather and enter job titles for potential clients of FTL Metrics.
